description: Provides a resource to create a forward domain of layer7 listener.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

BasicAuth.description: Indicates whether basic authentication is enable, default value is `false`.

CertificateId.description: ID of the server certificate, default value is `default`.

ClientCertificateId.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.26.0. Set `client_certificate_ids` instead. ID of the client certificate, default value is `default`.

ClientCertificateIds.description: ID list of the poly client certificate.

Domain.description: Forward domain of the layer7 listener.

GaapAuth.description: Indicates whether SSL certificate authentication is enable, default value is `false`.

RealserverAuth.description: Indicates whether realserver authentication is enable, default value is `false`.

RealserverCertificateDomain.description: CA certificate domain of the realserver.

RealserverCertificateId.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.28.0. Set `realserver_certificate_ids` instead. CA certificate ID of the realserver.

RealserverCertificateIds.description: CA certificate ID list of the realserver.
